metadata.title: CVE-2022-20482 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In createNotificationChannel of NotificationManager.java, there is a possible way to make the device unusable and require factory reset due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-240422263

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
